# DmiProperty.System.Family property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

This text string identifies the family to which a particular computer belongs.

Key Composition

* Structure: System
* Property: Family
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: String

Remarks

2.4+

```csharp
public static IPropertyKey Family { get; }
```
